title: NHK Train Cruise A Taste of Japanese Culture along the Oigawa Ri
description: Train Cruise: A Taste of Japanese Culture along the Oigawa River Travel Documentary hosted by Francesco Bellissimo, published by NHK in 2013 - English narration. http://docuwiki.net/images/d/d2/Train-Cruise-A-Taste-of-Japanese-Culture-along-the-Oigawa-River-Cover.jpg Information ------------------------------ The Oi River (Oigawa) flows through the center of Shizuoka Prefecture starting from the Southern Alps. The Oigawa Railways run a distance of 65km along the river. They feature a nostalgic steam locomotive and a tram which climbs a steep hill. This route draws the attention of railway enthusiasts as a functioning railway theme park. Along the route, we encounter thriving traditional Japanese culture and view beautiful forest scenery from the windows of retro rail cars.
